short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk download icons and stickers pack from flaticon.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help bulk download icons and stickers pack from https://www.flaticon.com. After installed, you should pin this extension on toolbar. Visit icon's pack or sticker's pack page of your choice. Then click action button to download. Downloaded items will be kept on separate folder using pack's name as folder name.
